articles.author: Tasmin Lockwood, Chloe Taylor
articles.title: Ray-Ban maker EssilorLuxottica falls 5.7% after Google plans AI glasses launch; Europe markets close lower - CNBC
articles.description: European shares ended lower on Tuesday as global investors await the U.S. Federal Reserve's monetary policy update.
articles.content:
LONDON European shares ended slightly negative on Tuesday as global investors await the U.S. Federal Reserve's monetary policy update.
